doc:
Eileen O'Brien (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eileen_O%27Brien_(actress) 0 Eileen O'Brien is an English actress who has played a wide variety of roles in British television over many years. She appeared in ITV soap opera, Emmerdale as Beattie Dixon, grandmother of Alex Moss, who turned up at the beginning of 2013 to look for her grandson. O'Brien previously appeared in the show as teacher, Bridget Burgess in 2006-2007. Back in 1987-1988, O'Brien had a recurring role in the BBC soap opera, EastEnders; she played Edie Smith, the mother of Linda Davidson's character, Mary. O'Brien has also appeared in The Crezz, Casualty, Doctors, The Royal, Where the Heart Is, Brookside, Heartbeat and Coronation Street to name but a few. In May 2009, she played Anne in BBC One miniseries Moving On. In 2013, she played Rita in the BBC comedy-drama Being Eileen. Eileen_O'Brien is an_English_actress who has_played a_wide_variety of roles in British_television over many_years . She appeared in ITV_soap_opera , Emmerdale as Beattie_Dixon , grandmother of Alex_Moss , who turned up at the_beginning of 2013 to_look for her_grandson . O'Brien previously appeared in the_show as teacher , Bridget_Burgess in 2006-2007 . Back in 1987-1988 , O'Brien had a_recurring_role in the_BBC_soap_opera , EastEnders ; she played Edie_Smith , the_mother of Linda_Davidson 's_character , Mary . O'Brien has_also_appeared in The_Crezz_,_Casualty_,_Doctors , The_Royal , Where the_Heart Is , Brookside , Heartbeat and Coronation_Street to_name but a_few . In May_2009 , she played Anne in BBC_One_miniseries Moving On . In 2013 , she played Rita in the_BBC_comedy-drama Being Eileen .
